item.title: EP 44 - Ghost To Ghost
item.itunes:title: Ghost To Ghost
item.description:
Today we say goodbye to a hero, take a physical with boy band BTS, and investigate the "ghost scare" that led to a murder.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Art Bell passed away and already the conspiracy theories have started. But lets remember the man and his legacy. I can definitely say without him, this podcast would have never existed.

Then, we take a look at Pancreas Denial. What is Pancreas Denial? Well, other than being listed on the Conspiracy Iceberg, we don't know much. Actually, we do know it has to do with wizards and possibly the Bangtan Boys!

And finally, we visit jolly ole England in the 18th century to attend a trial of a man who murdered a ghost. Well, kind of.

Links:

Art Bell

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Art_Bell

Art Bell Area 51 Call

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ee3bld4lTG0

The Pancreas is fake

https://archive.4plebs.org/x/thread/18597397/

https://archive.nyafuu.org/bant/thread/54768/#56795

I Dont Believe In Magic (But The Pancreas Is Real, baby)

https://archiveofourown.org/works/15255801?view_adult=true

Understanding your Chakras

http://foreverconscious.com/understanding-your-chakras

Assault, Robbery, and Murder: The Dark History of "Bedsheet Ghosts"

http://mentalfloss.com/article/507440/assault-robbery-and-murder-dark-history-bedsheet-ghosts

Devon rapist who pretended to be ghost jailed for 26 years

https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-devon-43830037

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
